title: Deep shit
creator_contributor_role: Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Melbourne (Vic.) - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Queen Victoria Market (Melbourne, Vic.)
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Martial arts films
description: When Mr Sideburns (Morgan Evans) stumbles across a security camera tape from the casino which incriminates the Premier, he finds a variety of sources are eager to lay hands on the material. With a casual nod to the Hong Kong action genre, Deep Shit's momentum carries the viewer through such recognisable Melbourne locales as Parliament Station, Melbourne Central and Queen Victoria Market.
